René Schmidt - Senior developer on the storage platform team at Uber

ABSTRACT
In this talk, we will dive into how the storage systems have evolved from the early days of Uber until today. We will go into the details on the decisions that we made and techniques that we have found useful in design of these systems, and on the importance of tooling and automation around operations, since all changes must be made online with no downtime or service disruption.
